Desc.entry: A registered charity and voluntary organisation which offers regular support, friendship and practical help to young families with children under 5 years under stress in their own homes, helping to prevent family crisis and breakdown. Works towards increasing the confidence and independence of the family. Provides support for mothers with post-natal depression. Self or any referral.

DisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair access to ground floor only

ContactName.entry: Karen Ritchie, Manager/Alison Vaughan/Ellen Summers, Administrators
